mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM jnl11_repr_acnt WHERE 1=1

SELECT jnl11_repr_acnt_cd AS jnl11ReprAcntCd /* 대표계정코드 */ , jnl11_repr_acnt_nm AS jnl11ReprAcntNm /* 대표계정명 */ , jnl11_acnt_attribute_cd AS jnl11AcntAttributeCd /* 계정속성코드(AcntAttrCode) */ , ( SELECT com02_code_nm /** 코드명*/ FROM com02_code WHERE 1=1 AND com02_com_cd = 'AcntAttrCode' AND com02_dtl_cd = A.jnl11_acnt_attribute_cd AND COALESCE(com02_use_yn,'false') = 'true' ) as jnl11AcntAttributeNm , jnl11_tgt_repr_acnt_cd AS jnl11TgtReprAcntCd /* 상대 대표계정코드 */ , ( SELECT jnl11_repr_acnt_nm FROM edu.jnl11_repr_acnt WHERE jnl11_repr_acnt_cd = A.jnl11_tgt_repr_acnt_cd ) AS jnl11TgtReprAcntNm FROM jnl11_repr_acnt A WHERE 1=1
AND jnl11_repr_acnt_cd = #{jnl11ReprAcntCd}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jnl11_repr_acnt WHERE 1=1 AND jnl11_repr_acnt_cd = #{jnl11ReprAcntCd}
